metadata.title: CVE-2019-8357 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in SoX 14.4.2. lsx_make_lpf in effect_i_dsp.callows a NULL pointer dereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8357` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsox-fmt-all - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
libsox-fmt-alsa - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
libsox-fmt-ao - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
libsox-fmt-base - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
libsox-fmt-mp3 - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
libsox-fmt-oss - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
libsox-fmt-pulse - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
libsox3 - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
sox - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '14.4.2+git20190427-1').
